ing: 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon lime juice, or to taste
des: "A Mexican-style side dish made of chicken and avocado, no cooking required. It's a quick, healthy, and delicious recipe guaranteed to make you feel and look good."
ins:
Stir chicken, cilantro, and chili powder together in a bowl.
Arrange avocado halves on serving dish and sprinkle with lime juice. Spoon chicken mixture into avocado halves.
